title: A brief history of Supergravity: the first three weeks
abstract: I summarize, at its 41st--and what would have been Bruno's 94th-birthday, the history of the discoveries of Supergravity.
note: This work was supported by grants NSF PHY-1266107 and DOE#desc0011632. I thank my moderating encouragers, Mike Duff and Mary K. Gaillard.
